org.jplot2d.swing

Class JPlot2DComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • org.jplot2d.swing.JPlot2DComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.HierarchyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, RenderingFinishedListener

    public class JPlot2DComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.HierarchyListener, RenderingFinishedListener
    A JComponent that display a plot in its center.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • JPlot2DComponent

        public JPlot2DComponent(Plot plot)
        Construct a JComponent to display the given plot in its center. The plot properties can be safely by multiple threads.
        Parameters:
        plot - the plot to be display

      • JPlot2DComponent

        public JPlot2DComponent(Plot plot,
                boolean threadSafe)
        Construct a JComponent to display the given plot in its center.
        Parameters:
        plot - the plot to be display
        threadSafe - if false, all plot properties can only be changed within a single thread. if true, all plot properties can be safely changed by multiple threads.

      • JPlot2DComponent

        public JPlot2DComponent(RenderEnvironment env)
        Construct a JComponent to display a plot in its center. The plot has been assigned to the given RenderEnvironment.
        Parameters:
        env - the RenderEnvironment

    • Method Detail

      • getRenderEnvironment

        public RenderEnvironment getRenderEnvironment()
        Return the RenderEnvironment of this JPlot2DComponent. The RenderEnvironment generate plot images and display them in this component.
        Returns:
        the RenderEnvironment of this JPlot2DComponent

      • getPlotBackground

        public java.awt.Color getPlotBackground()
        Returns the background color of plot. The default color is Color.WHITE.
        Returns:
        the background color of plot

      • renderingFinished

        public void renderingFinished(RenderingFinishedEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: RenderingFinishedListener
        This method is called by image renderer. The renderer may be asynchronous, so the concurrency must be considered in this method.
        Specified by:
        renderingFinished in interface RenderingFinishedListener
        Parameters:
